summary: This document is an email chain between individuals discussing a presentation outline titled 'Brass materials' and an updated PowerPoint, with the intent to send it to 'the chiefs.' The sender is identified as an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified by their title from the Southern District of New York, is providing an updated presentation outline and PowerPoint.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Brass presentation
events.description: An email was sent with an updated presentation outline and PowerPoint on a shared drive, discussing sending the materials to 'the chiefs.'

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 14, 2019, concerning 'Brass materials' and a presentation.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses sending updated presentation materials to 'the chiefs,' indicating a review or briefing process.
